disobedience.question: Did I use my words to belittle the Church?

condoning.question: Did I ever allow fellow Catholics to think it was acceptable to stay away from Sacraments or Mass?

autonomy.question: Did you take for granted the good things in your life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence, especially when achieving success through hard work and determination?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

envy.question: Have I secretly resented the accomplishments and successes of others, even when they are good things?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and use words that were obscene or unbecoming to others?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in such a manner that is unbefitting of a Christian
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others in such a manner that is unbefitting of a Christian, violating their dignity through my words?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: with words that wounded their dignity
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others with words that wounded their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
in social events or family gatherings
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, perhaps while engaging in social events or family gatherings?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking to an extent that was not reasonable for my own good
to an extent that was not reasonable for my own good
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking to an extent that was not reasonable for my own good, potentially harming my health and well-being?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable through your daily habits
beyond what 's reasonable through your daily habits
possibly by consuming excess food or beverages during social gatherings or family events
during social gatherings or family events
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable through your daily habits, possibly by consuming excess food or beverages during social gatherings or family events?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: for purposes that take precedence over my financial obligations or family needs
over my financial obligations or family needs
prodigality.question: Have I excessively and wastefully used resources entrusted to me for purposes that take precedence over my financial obligations or family needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: over my financial responsibilities and obligations
prodigality.question: Have I excessively gambled to take precedence over my financial responsibilities and obligations towards those in need?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: particularly in regards to providing for my family 's needs
to providing for my family 's needs
prodigality.question: Have I used gambling to prioritize personal entertainment over my financial obligations, particularly in regards to providing for my family's needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing others ' faults or private affairs
through conversations with friends or acquaintances at community events , online forums , or social gatherings
with friends or acquaintances at community events , online forums , or social gatherings
at community events , online forums , or social gatherings
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs, even if what I shared was true, through conversations with friends or acquaintances at community events, online forums, or social gatherings?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing others ' faults or private affairs
through casual conversations with friends or acquaintances
gossip.question: Have I derived pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs, even if what I shared was true, through casual conversations with friends or acquaintances?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in speaking about others ' personal matters
gossip.question: Have I derived pleasure in speaking about others' personal matters, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: on a Sunday when otherwise it could be avoided , thereby disregarding the sacred character of the day
impiety.question: Did I use my professional experience and skills on a Sunday when otherwise it could be avoided, thereby disregarding the sacred character of the day?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

extracted_data_phrases: rather than seeking reconciliation through forgiveness and understanding
anger.question: Have I allowed anger to fester within me, rather than seeking reconciliation through forgiveness and understanding?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.
